sentences.sContent: Butterflies and moths are attracted to the wild flowers.
sentences.sCn: 蝴蝶和飞蛾为野花所吸引。

synos.tran: [昆]蝴蝶；蝶泳；举止轻浮的人；追求享乐的人

phrases.pCn: 张开蝴蝶的两翼，置于玻璃盒中(作为标本)

remMethod.val: butter(黄油)+fly(飞)→颜色像黄油一样会飞的东西→蝴蝶

trans.tranOther: a type of insect that has large wings, often with beautiful colours
